hero.subtitle: Any Model, Any Hardware, Peak Performance.
hero.description: Effortlessly deploy, manage, and scale LLMs, multimodal, and speech models with our enterprise-grade, full-stack inference platform. Your infrastructure, your models, optimized.
hero.features: Model lifecycle management, multiple inference engines, heterogeneous GPUs, high throughput and availability, efficient scheduling

webDevelopment.title: LLM Applications
webDevelopment.description: Build and deploy web applications powered by large language models with ease and efficiency.

digitalMarketing.title: AI Chatbots
digitalMarketing.description: Create high-performance AI chatbots to enhance customer support and user engagement.

saasProducts.title: Multimodal AI
saasProducts.description: Integrate text, image, and audio capabilities with multimodal AI solutions for innovative experiences.

appsDevelopment.title: Voice AI Integration
appsDevelopment.description: Leverage speech recognition and synthesis technologies to create new user interaction experiences.

seoServices.title: AI Content Generation
seoServices.description: Automatically generate high-quality content to maximize SEO optimization and marketing effectiveness.

dataAnalysis.title: Intelligent Analytics
dataAnalysis.description: Utilize AI-powered data analysis and insights to support business decisions and accelerate growth.

section.title: Enterprise-grade LLM Deployment platform
section.description: Comprehensive AI inference service solution providing powerful AI capability support for your applications

engines.title: Multi-Engine Concurrent Inference
engines.description: Support vLLM, SGLang, Transformer, MLX and other engines to start simultaneously, providing large-scale multi-feature inference services for enterprises.

hardware.title: Extensive Computing Power Support
hardware.description: Comprehensive support for mainstream computing power chips: Nvidia, Intel, AMD, Apple and other heterogeneous hardware, with unified computing scheduling for heterogeneous computing power.

performance.title: Enterprise-grade Distributed Deployment
performance.description: Based on self-developed Xoscar high-performance distributed computing foundation, supporting stable operation at 200,000-core scale with automatic load balancing and fault recovery capabilities.

models.title: Comprehensive Model Repository
models.description: Integrating 100+ latest models, including mainstream models like deepseek, Qwen3, InternVL, supporting voice, multimodal and other model types.

enterprise.title: Enterprise-grade Management Functions
enterprise.description: Providing fine-tuning support, permission management, monitoring systems, batch processing and other enterprise-grade functions to meet professional domain requirements in finance, healthcare, etc.

concurrency.title: High Concurrency Optimization
concurrency.description: Optimized for enterprise high-concurrency scenarios, supports structured output, provides memory optimization and performance acceleration, ensuring business continuity and stability.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your AI Journey?
cta.description: Experience the powerful AI inference capabilities of Xinference now

openSource.title: Open Source & Free to Use
openSource.description: Xinference is an open-source project that's free to use, customize, and extend according to your needs.

footer.description: The most comprehensive enterprise-grade inference service platform, providing high-performance and highly available solutions for generative AI scenarios.
